thread.title: Big deal...beautiful lot! For Sale in La Alegría de Siquirres
thread.title_full: Big deal...beautiful lot! For Sale in La Alegría de Siquirres

author: Mariana
title: Big deal...beautiful lot! For Sale in La Alegría de Siquirres
text:
Cantón: Siquirres Land: 8155m2 
La Alegría de Siquirres has seen a lot of development in recent years due to its location, landscapes, rivers, excellent land, cool climate and security. This property could generate a lot of profit with a good business in a growing economy. Finding a property of this nature and quality is difficult, but if you’re looking to invest, this property is versatile and a great place for your business, your house or both. It’s a wonderfully located property as it is near to Route 32 (San José- Limón) as well as Route 415 (Turrialba – La Alegría) along with the alternate route of Route 10 (Cartago – Siquirres), which allows you to connect not only with neighbors, but anyone in the region. If you are looking for an investment opportunity, look no further!
